TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000OZY7R:ref

Hi Daniel,

I have made some changes to the script and it is working properly now, you can go ahead and close this ticket. Thanks a lot for the quick assistance.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #443482 - Need EPP agent for Amazon Linux 2

TextBody:
Hello Gaurav,

Thank you for getting back to us. 

In the installation package, there is a file called options.sh . Please open it and uncomment the following lines:
#EPPCLIENT_WS_SERVER=set.this.to.the.endpointprotector.server.com
#export EPPCLIENT_WS_SERVER

#EPPCLIENT_WS_PORT=443
#export EPPCLIENT_WS_PORT

#EPPCLIENT_DEPARTMENT_CODE=defdep
#export EPPCLIENT_DEPARTMENT_CODE

Fill in the details and then run the install.sh file as admin. 

Please check and let us know if you encounter any issues. 

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
